alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:35AM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of winter driving conditions will occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
